thread.title: WATCH: Porzingis posterizes Dwight Howard with monster dunk | NBA | Sporting News
thread.title_full: WATCH: Porzingis posterizes Dwight Howard with monster dunk | NBA | Sporting News

author: Benyam Kidane
title: WATCH: Porzingis posterizes Dwight Howard with monster dunk | NBA | Sporting News
text:
January 29, 2017 6:30pm EST January 29, 2017 5:53pm EST Battle of the bigs! Benyam Kidane 
Published on Jan. 29, 2017 
Jan. 29, 2017 
Kristaps Porzingis went back and forth with Dwight Howard during the New York Knicks' clash against the Atlanta Hawks, but it looks like KP may have won the battle of the bigs. 
During the third quarter, Porzingis gathered a pass from Brandon Jennings on the baseline and launched off one foot straight at Howard, cramming home the posterizing jam. 
Click the player above to watch the furious finish.
